channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17726] Using exists may lead to incorrect results
item.description:
drop table if exists tx1;
create table tx1 (a integer,b integer);
insert into tx1	values  (1, 1),
                        (1, 2),
                        (1, 3);

select count(*) as result,3 as expected from tx1 u
where exists (select * from tx1 v where u.a=v.a and u.b <> v.b);

select count(*) as result,3 as expected from tx1 u
where exists (select * from tx1 v where u.a=v.a and u.b <> v.b limit 1);

current results are 6 and 2.
item.summary: Using exists may lead to incorrect results

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Seems like this problem arises from the fact the exists is somewhere translated into an inner join.

At least this seems to be the problem to me at this point:
https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/caf3330330c9c8c5fc922f3186ddeab4266b60bb/ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/parse/SemanticAnalyzer.java#L8873

I think the correct join type would be leftsemi for these cases.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12891137/HIVE-17726.1.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12891638 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Hi vgarg, kgyrtkirk,
Is it possible that this change is causing these failures:
https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/7290/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli/TestSparkCliDriver/testCliDriver_subquery_multi_/

Probably there was a concurrent change, or somehow the tests were not running

Thanks,
Peter
pvary intresting...I've checked that HIVE-17756 + HIVE-17726 together have caused Spark/subquery_views failure.
Thanks kgyrtkirk for the investigation!
Hi pvary. This does look like caused by HIVE-17726. Is there a JIRA associated with the failure? I'll update the test and will commit it.

vgarg: Check with dapengsun, and xuefuz, they might be already working on a fix started from HIVE-17756.

Thanks,
Peter
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
